article.title: Lockheed Martin Awarded $78.6 Million Contract to Produce Upgrades for Aegis Weapon System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin has received a $78.6 million contract from the U.S. Navy to produce the next evolution of hardware that will be incorporated into the Aegis Modernization and Aegis Ballistic Missile Defense programs.
